title: riot report
body: dudes i log in on my account i choose ranked game and i run it! then im in champion choose room and i cant see the champions.. i want to report this on riot i dont know how.. help me

replies.body:
Damn, so everything seems to run fine up to champion select which results in a black screen?  I want to help, but you'll want to troubleshoot in custom games to prevent any penalties.  Firstly, try enabling [low spec mode](https://i.gyazo.com/a39e12ca76e54359342203c476a0e9c1.png) mode in case of too much pc stress failing to load assets.  

If the issue persists, download the [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) and use it to run a clean reinstall.  This will help fix up any potentially bad files since updating.  

Let me know how this works out for you.
